posts.post_title: N172 M. Welch for sale - Beautiful and even Cheaper -- Price Reduced
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Paul
1887 N172 Old Judge of Hall of Famer Mickey Welch.  The photo is beautiful, crisp, and clear.  It has been rebacked, which accounts for the reduced price of $500, shipped.  This is probably the cheapest Mickey Welch card you will ever find -- certainly for one with so nice a picture.  First one to email me at pstewart@kmob.com saying that they'll take it gets the card.
